SOBER Act of 2022
Supporting Opportunities to Build Everyday Responsibility Act of 2022
To direct the Attorney General to establish a grant program with respect to 24-7 sobriety programs, and for other purposes.

bill.summary:
Supporting Opportunities to Build Everyday Responsibility Act of 2022 or the SOBER Act of 2022
This bill directs the Department of Justice to establish a grant program to provide funding for 24-7 sobriety programs. It also directs the National Institute of Justice to evaluate the policies and procedures used by grant recipients to reduce crime, recidivism, and incarceration attributed to use of alcohol or controlled substances.
